attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let us have some money to spend on ourselfs and not to the goverment to waste on anything stupid, road tax, council tax, any taxes going its all too high

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on tax:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
